item.title: R Shiny App Correlation Coefficient
item.description: Background This post was created from a 2021 Pennsylvania State University (PSU) Stat 485 class project as a way for students to learn R and associated RStudio IDE. Iâ€™ve copied the code as I created it during the class and re-hosted the app in a new location given that I am no longer a student. This tutorial will review the source code which generates the Shiny App as demonstrated below.
